divs: sighting detailsthought i was looking at an on coming airliner at cruising alt. when it was closer and going overhead there were no wingtip or body marker lights. also it stayed looking the same going away, like when its main headlights are coming at you . time sunset\dusk 10:15pm dst took 2 \3 mins looked like normal altitude for airliner at cruising speed ( i live in the landing path to metro airport, dearborn) no jet sound it was just bright white type oval looking light from when i first saw it till it went out of veiw. i was just sitting in my backyard smoking, just watching the sky as drakness was happening. looking at planes and waiting for stars starting to show up in darkness. planes going into metro fly from northeast to southwest and are at 1500 feet as they fly by this was going from northwest to southeast till it faded away in the distance as a normal jet would. i have no pictures, drawings, etc.
Summary: bright object going from northwest to southeast . thought it was jet liner but as it went overhead there no marker lights,and it stayed just as bright going away
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Dearborn
There were no other sightings in Dearborn on or around June 25th 0001
